DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to evaluate the efficacy of icotinib as adjuvant therapy in treating such patients. The primary endpoint is to compare the recurrence-free survival after 1-year or 2-year treatment with icotinib.
DOC.brief_title: Icotinib as Adjuvant Therapy in Treating Non-small-cell Lung Cancer Patients With Positive EGFR Mutation
DOC.detailed_description: Adjuvant therapy has been proved effective in treating stage II-IIIA non-small-cell lung cancer. However, few data on the treating time of adjuvant therapy is available. Here we conduct a randomized, prospective study to compare the recurrence-free survival after 1-year or 2-year treatment with icotinib in EGFR-mutated non-small cell lung cancer patients.
